resources.string: A short introduction and general overview

Welcome!\n\nThis is the Showcase app for the Kubriko game engine - a lightweight, scalable, and easy-to-use solution for creating simple 2D games for Android, Desktop (Windows, Linux, MacOS), iOS and Web.

Kubriko is based on Compose Multiplatform, and can easily be integrated into such projects. The main goal of developing it was to offer an intuitive library, written 100% in Kotlin, that works seamlessly on the target platforms listed above.
For more information, check out the GitHub repository and the YouTube tutorials:
